text: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak
author: Alan Dundes

text: I don’t believe in astrology; I’m a Sagittarius and we’re skeptical
author: Arthur C. Clarke

text: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don’t need it
author: Bob Hope

text: Education is learning what you didn’t even know you didn’t know
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

text: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do
author: Isaac Asimov

text: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it
author: Laurence J. Peter

text: When I was a boy the Dead Sea was only sick
author: George Burns

text: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific
author: Lily Tomlin

text: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night
author: Steve Martin

text: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member
author: Groucho Marx

text: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back
author: Oscar Wilde

text: He who laughs last didn’t get the joke.
author: Charles de Gaulle
